description: Taking your dog for twice daily walks, for a total of an hour, could become compulsory from next year.
title: Walkies could become the law for German dog owners
title_page: Walkies could become the law for German dog owners - BBC News
maintext: A spokeswoman for the agriculture ministry said it was very unlikely private dog owners would receive police visits to check whether they had taken their pooch for a walk. She said the emphasis would be on ensuring that dogs kept in kennels were treated well.
